gamerules.name: announceAdvancements
gamerules.description: Whether advancements should be announced in chat

gamerules.name: commandBlockOutput
gamerules.description: Whether command blocks should notify admins when they perform commands

gamerules.name: disableElytraMovementCheck
gamerules.description: Whether the server should skip checking player speed when the player is wearing elytra. Often helps with jittering due to lag in multiplayer

gamerules.name: disableRaids
gamerules.description: Whether raids are disabled

gamerules.name: doDaylightCycle
gamerules.description: Whether the daylight cycle and moon phases progress

gamerules.name: doEntityDrops
gamerules.description: Whether entities that are not mobs should have drops

gamerules.name: doFireTick
gamerules.description: Whether fire should spread and naturally extinguish

gamerules.name: doInsomnia
gamerules.description: Whether phantoms can spawn in the nighttime

gamerules.name: doImmediateRespawn
gamerules.description: Players respawn immediately without showing the death screen

gamerules.name: doLimitedCrafting
gamerules.description: Whether players should be able to craft only those recipes that they've unlocked first

gamerules.name: doMobLoot
gamerules.description: Whether mobs should drop items and experience orbs

gamerules.name: doMobSpawning
gamerules.description: Whether mobs should naturally spawn. Does not affect monster spawners

gamerules.name: doPatrolSpawning
gamerules.description: Whether patrols can spawn

gamerules.name: doTileDrops
gamerules.description: Whether blocks should have drops

gamerules.name: doTraderSpawning
gamerules.description: Whether wandering traders can spawn

gamerules.name: doWeatherCycle
gamerules.description: Whether the weather can change naturally. The /weather command can still change weather.

gamerules.name: drowningDamage
gamerules.description: Whether the player should take damage when drowning

gamerules.name: fallDamage
gamerules.description: Whether the player should take fall damage

gamerules.name: fireDamage
gamerules.description: Whether the player should take damage in fire, lava, campfires, or on magma blocks

gamerules.name: forgiveDeadPlayers
gamerules.description: Makes angered neutral mobs stop being angry when the targeted player dies nearby

gamerules.name: freezeDamage
gamerules.description: Whether the player should take damage when inside powder snow

gamerules.name: keepInventory
gamerules.description: Whether the player should keep items and experience in their inventory after death

gamerules.name: logAdminCommands
gamerules.description: Whether to log admin commands to server log

gamerules.name: maxCommandChainLength
gamerules.description: The maximum length of a chain of commands that can be executed during one tick. Applies to command blocks and functions.

gamerules.name: maxEntityCramming
gamerules.description: The maximum number of pushable entities a mob or player can push, before taking 3(one and a half hearts) suffocation damage per half-second. Setting to 0 or lower disables the rule. Damage affects survival-mode or adventure-mode players, and all mobs but bats. Pushable entities include non-spectator-mode players, any mob except bats, as well as boats and minecarts.

gamerules.name: mobGriefing
gamerules.description: Whether creepers, zombies, endermen, ghasts, withers, ender dragons, rabbits, sheep, villagers, silverfish, snow golems, and end crystals should be able to change blocks and whether mobs can pick up items, which also disables bartering. This also affects the capability of zombie-like creatures like zombified piglins and drowned to pathfind to turtle eggs.

gamerules.name: naturalRegeneration
gamerules.description: Whether the player can regenerate health naturally if their hunger is full enough (doesn't affect external healing, such as golden apples, the Regeneration effect, etc.)

gamerules.name: playersSleepingPercentage
gamerules.description: What percentage of players must sleep to skip the night

gamerules.name: randomTickSpeed
gamerules.description: How often a random block tick occurs (such as plant growth, leaf decay, etc.) per chunk section per game tick. 0 and negative values disables random ticks, higher numbers increase random ticks. Setting to a high integer results in high speeds of decay and growth. Numbers over 4096 make plant growth or leaf decay instantaneous.

gamerules.name: reducedDebugInfo
gamerules.description: Whether the debug screen shows all or reduced information; and whether the effects of F3+B (entity hitboxes) and F3+G (chunk boundaries) are shown.

gamerules.name: sendCommandFeedback
gamerules.description: Whether the feedback from commands executed by a player should show up in chat. Also affects the default behavior of whether command blocks store their output text.

gamerules.name: showDeathMessages
gamerules.description: Whether death messages are put into chat when a player dies. Also affects whether a message is sent to the pet's owner when the pet dies.

gamerules.name: spawnRadius
gamerules.description: The number of blocks outward from the world spawn coordinates that a player spawns in when first joining a server or when dying without a personal spawnpoint.

gamerules.name: spectatorsGenerateChunks
gamerules.description: Whether players in spectator mode can generate chunks

gamerules.name: universalAnger
gamerules.description: Makes angered neutral mobs attack any nearby player, not just the player that angered them. Works best if forgiveDeadPlayers is disabled.
